yapanayedi athurudan wu lalith saha kugan rajaye bharaye sitina bawata thama prakasha kale aarakshaka amathyanshaya labadun thorathuruwalata anuwa bawa hitapu kabinat prakashaka, parlimenthu manthri keheliya rambaukwalla sadahan kala.ee, mema siddhiya sambandhayen yapanaya mahesthrath adhikaranaya hamuwe wibhaga wana naduwata adalawa ada sakshi labademin.jagath manawa himikam dina samarum uthsawayaka sanwidhana katayuthu awasan kara niwasata yamin sitiyadi lalith kumara wiraraj saha kugan muruganandan athurudan wuye 2011 wasare desambar 9 wana da rathriyeyi.eheth eeta dina 6kata pasu kolambaa pawathi kabinat madhya hamuwata ekwemin lalith saha kugan athurudanwa nomathi bawata ewakata kabinat amathyawarayawa siti keheliya rambaukwalla sadahan kala.hitapu amathyawarayage mema prakashaya padanam kara ganimin owunge gnyathin shreshtadhikaranaya hamuwe habayas kopus pethsamak idiripath kale anathuruwayi.pasuwa me sambandhayen wimarshanayak sidukarana lesa shreshtadhikaranaya yapanaya mahesthrath adhikaranaya wetha niyoga kala.ee anuwa siddhiye sakshikaruwan lesa nam kara thibena amathya keheliya rambaukwalla yapanaye mahesthrath adhikaranaya hamuwe ada sakshi labadunne mulwaratayi.2011 wasare desambar 15 wana da pawathi kabinat thirana danum dime madhya hamuwedi lalith saha kugan rajaya bharaye sitina bawata thaman prakasha kale ewakata aarakshaka amathyanshaya labadun thorathuruwalata anuwa hitapu amathyawaraya mehidi kiya sitiya.lalith kumara wiraraj saha kugan muruganandan kalak janatha wimukthi peramuna samanga katayuthu kala athara, athurudan wana wita owun kriyakariwa katayuthu kale peratugami samajawadi pakshaya samangayi.lalith kumar awissawella - siriniwasawaththa pradeshaye padinchikaruweku wana athara ohu yapanayata gos athurudan wuwan pilibanda sewime katayuthuwala nirathawi thibuna.ohuta sahaya dakwu kugan muruganandan yapanaya pradeshaye padinchikaruwek.ewakata aarakshaka anshaya wisin lalith saha kugan pahara ganu labu  bawa hitapu amathya keheliya rambaukwalla ada labadun sakshiyen thahawuru wu bawayi peratugami samajawadi pakshaye pracharaka lekam puubudu jayagoda sandahan kale.nadu wibhagayen pasu yapanaye pawathi madhya hamuwakata ekwemin ohu me bawa kiya sitiya.
gahanu lamayinta kurullan saha pihatu pachchayak nirmanaya kirima
